title: 67. The Effects of Love Bombing
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about love bombing. We get into what love bombing is, how to spot love bombing, and how to deal with the effects of being love bombed.

Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!

(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)

Click here to get your FREE copy of my Anatomy of Self Love workbook
(or visit https://bold-hill-3643.ck.page/fcba542339)

Business Inquiries?

IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
